title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. V, pt. 97 - Administrative Enforcement By The Attorney General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. V, pt. 97 - Administrative Enforcement By The Attorney General

State Regulations
§ 97.1 - Procedures applicable to administrative proceedings commenced by the attorney general pursuant to article 7-a section 177
§ 97.2 - Remedies in attorney general's administrative proceeding
§ 97.3 - Notice of violation
§ 97.4 - Requests for hearings
§ 97.5 - Notice of hearing
§ 97.6 - Administrative hearing officers
§ 97.7 - Adjournments
§ 97.8 - Subpoenas
§ 97.9 - Conduct of the hearing
§ 97.10 - Representation
§ 97.11 - Evidence
§ 97.12 - Record
§ 97.13 - Costs
§ 97.14 - Motions
§ 97.15 - Findings of fact
§ 97.16 - Time periods
§ 97.17 - Final determinations and orders
§ 97.18 - Stay of the decision or order
§ 97.19 - Administrative appeal from the decision or order
§ 97.20 - Judicial appeal from the final administrative determination

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. V, pt. 97

Statutory authority: Executive Law, § 177.1; Estates, Powers and Trusts Law, § 8-1.4[h]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
